Message.Title: I see The Gang Of Illiterate Imperfects Are At It Again. Still At It Year After Year After Year
Message.Msg: Poor John Osborne z50com and East Coast Sybil. They stalk on false information, while their own publicly posted words disgrace them and admit their crimes, so they repeat their worthlessness again, in however many IDs. Over and over. Year after year after year, to no avail or result. We all see now they can't even afford the poorhouse. I've been busy here at the end of the school year but looked back this morning over my past helpful posts and saw 5,000 failed IDs, wasted 5,000,000 useless posts, and 5 trillion hateful words over false info that never hurt me and only destroyed themselves. Their "all one poster" myth owns them totally. Weak minds are just that fragile. I do have to hand it to Flyktning for at least trying to shush them, for once.

Message.Title: Good Morning! A Beautiful Spring Day From Fantastic Philadelphia
Message.Msg: The end of the school year approaches! I'm so proud of the young lives I met and taught, and how they are so knowledgeable and enthusiastic, going out into the world, to its benefit. I looked back over some of my old posts today and saw 5,000 failed IDs wasted 5,000,000 useless posts and 5 trillion hateful words on false information that never hurt me, or anyone, and only destroyed themselves. I'm so happy my students stand for justice. They will only fight board trolls. They will never be one. I'm especially proud of my Board's Best Authors, like Dr. Clarify, Exhausted Mystic Ruler, Shack King, Gina, Middy and so many other superbly intelligent posters that the Gang Of Illiterates have ran off with their hate and threats. My Best Author's words are the only words that matter in the long run. I hope that helps.
